data.title: Wayne D. Minich, Founder
data.text:
I have been in the financial services industry for over 40 years and have loved every moment of it. My passion is helping people as I would like to be helped—a principle which is at the core of every interaction with our company. In my experience, the best way to do this is through building long-term relationships with our clients, many of whom have become my friends. They have made my time in this career rich and rewarding.

Education and Certifications:

CLU® - Chartered Life Underwriter®

ChFC – Chartered Financial Consultant

Life, Variable, Accident & Health licensed

Series 7 licensed

Bachelor of Arts – Denison University

Advanced Certificates in Estate Planning, Pension Planning, Employee Benefit Planning

Outside of Work, You'll Find Me:

Spending time with my four children and eight grandchildren

Skiing in Colorado

Golfing

Shooting sporting clays or pheasant hunting

Favorite Quote:

“If you do what you love, you’ll never work a day in your life” –Marc Anthony

“How old would you be if you didn’t know how old you are” –Satchel Paige
